description:
The AudioMoth USB Microphone App is an easy to use tool for customising your AudioMoth devices.
	Using it you can implement a streaming USB microphone.

**Please Note**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
summary: An Electron-based application capable of configuring the functionality of the AudioMoth-USB-Microphone firmware.
author: OpenAcousticDevices
